bibl.title: Preliminary Report on the Survey of El-Kur Island and Environs, Miami Beach, Alexandria, Egypt.
bibl.note: Survey carried out in 2004, by the Department of Underwater Archaeology of the SCA, on El-Kur island, 10 km to the east of the eastern harbour of Alexandria. - Quarry traces. - Roman cistern. - Empty tomb? - Comment.
bibl.seg: Ragheb Ashraf Abdel-Raouf, Preliminary Report on the Survey of El-Kur Island and Environs, Miami Beach, Alexandria, Egypt.

Survey carried out in 2004, by the Department of Underwater Archaeology of the SCA, on El-Kur island, 10 km to the east of the eastern harbour of Alexandria. - Quarry traces. - Roman cistern. - Empty tomb? - Comment.
